Name: Mayur
Review Text: Mayur cuisine has opened for over 38 years in this location. Over this time it is safe to say the food present is nothing less of perfection. Each meal has a particular blend of spices to fit its medium. The restaurant offers a variety of ‚Ä¶

Review Text: I recently moved to OC and have been looking for good Indian food in my area. After trying 3 other places closer to us, we tried Mayur Cuisine of India. This was it! what I had been looking for! the food was fantastic! I had the lamb curry ‚Ä¶

Name: Mayur
Review Text: The prices are high for the colored food that they offer. The taste is off even though some dishes look a little more authentic. Hate eating this kind of indian food as I'm from India. ‚Ä¶

Name: Mayur
Review Text: Owner was magnificent along with attentive service staff. The food was fabulous and fresh. The Naan bread was phenomenal. Assisted with pairing wine for our dinner. It is rare for us to have such a great experience and welcoming conversation in a new experience. Highly recommend.

Name: Mayur
Review Text: We love Indian food and have recently discovered this gem. The food is excellent and very high quality. After going 4 times, both my wife have decided this is our favorite Indian restaurant!

Name: Mayur
Review Text:

Name: Mayur
Review Text: Mayur Cuisine of India has THE BEST food! The owner is so humble and sweet. She always comes to check on her customers and you can tell that they take pride in their food and in their service. Love this place! :)

Name: Mayur
Review Text: The chicken was dry and tough and the shrimp was rubbery.  Food was expensive.  Still looking for a good Indian restaurant.

Name: Mayur
Review Text: Loved this place and the service. Aside from the great food, customer service was amazing. The food arrived quickly and was very flavorful.

Name: Mayur

Name: Mayur
Review Text: Love this spot, been here for years. Excellent Indian food.

Name: Mayur
Review Text: Indian is my favorite ethnic cuisine, and Mayur is by far, by far, the best Indian restaurant I've found in Southern California. My wife and mother feel the same. My mother has insisted I take her here every Mother's Day and on her birthday ‚Ä¶

Name: Mayur
Review Text: Delicious!! Biryani was the some of the best I‚Äôve ever had, and all the ingredients were so fresh.

Name: Mayur
Review Text: I like the place, but it is too expensive for what you get. The lamb Vindaloo was perfectly spiced, however the meat was a little overcooked. The vegetarian curry was quite poor, the sauce was bland and salty. Having to pay $6 per person for plain white rice is just a complete ripoff.

Name: Mayur
Review Text: I don't normally get excited about restaurants but this is my new all-time favorite Indian restaurant. The quality of everything was awesome. Tasty. Tender. Attractive. Seasoned perfectly. The owner/hostess is an absolute gem, helping with ‚Ä¶

Name: Mayur
Review Text: We love to go to quality Indian restaurants so were happy to purchase a coupon from Travel Zoo. We were offered a two-top table which was tight while others were offered larger tables. The pakoras were greasy and in some instances batter ‚Ä¶

Name: Mayur
Review Text: I love this restaurant!!  Each summer I return to Corona Del Mar and this is my first stop. The beautiful restaurant is warm and welcoming, the food is outstanding, the price is just right. But best of all, the people who run this are hands down the nicest people if ever met. I look forward to seeing you in the summer!

Name: Mayur
Review Text: I eat every week from Mayur. I have dined in at the restaurant and got the food delivered home too. I was happy with both types of services. The food is delicious. I specially like the way the desserts are served. The owner is a great lady who ensures that every thing is on point.

Name: Mayur
Review Text: I like this spot! They serve excellent food, they have a nice menu, The cook in that spot is very trained, I enjoy a lot eating all their food. The dishes are consistently of high class, the attitude towards the clients  is very good too. I often go to  this restaurant and I not even once was discontended. I recommend it to all.

Name: Mayur
Review Text:

Review Text: The service was great but the food was average... we started with Samosa which was great as starter... the other dishes ... average and below ....

Name: Mayur
Review Text: I live in Illinois but have relatives in Newport Beach. Every time I visit I request to eat at Mayur. The food is always amazing. The owner speaks to you and sincerely wants to know about your experience. I highly recommend checking out Mayur even if you are unsure if you will like Indian food or not!

Name: Mayur
Review Text: Not sure at all why the bad reviews! My family has loved this place for many years and we are here tonight.  The service won't kiss your ass, but they do a great job and make no mistakes, are considerate and precise.  The food is the best ‚Ä¶

Review Text: This place is incredible! Such great Masala‚Äôs and garlic naan. Anju, one of the owners is incredibly kind and ensures that everything comes out perfectly. Will definitely be visiting this place again!

Name: Mayur
Review Text: Very good food, and a little different than many other Indian places. It is certainly among the best Indian food I've had. It did not have that taste and feel of ethnic food that's been Americanized, not even a little bit. Perhaps that's ‚Ä¶

Review Text:

Name: Mayur
Review Text: Simply great north Indian food.  Quiet, comfortable and very friendly staff and owner.  This is a big step up from most Indian food in this area.  Highly recommended; if you like lamb try the tandoori lamb chops!

Name: Mayur
Review Text: Chef Dharam Singh and Host Ms. Anju Kapoor - that is about the best combination in Indian Cuisine in ALL of my experience. I have had Indian Cuisine in every State in the USA, in Every Country in Europe and almost all the Major Cities in ‚Ä¶

Name: Mayur
Review Text: Very delicious food. Came here for my first time trying Indian food since I was diagnosed with Celiac Disease. Helpful staff helped me find what menu options I could eat and I really enjoyed the flavors of the dish.

Name: Mayur
Review Text: I had the Chicken Tikka today and it was so good! The chicken came out juicy and savory.  I tried the cheese nan and it was amazing. I also had the Bindi Masala and that was great too.

Name: Mayur
Review Text: Seriously the best Indian food restaurant in Orange County!!! Worth every penny! It is run by the sweetest family, and the food is incomparable. Always piping hot, fresh and flavorful. Some of the best dishes we've ever had: Chicken Tikka Masala (of course), Shahi Korma, Samosas, and the OMG Naan.

Name: Mayur
Review Text:
It is the best in Southern California for Indian cuisine. Service is 5 stars.

Review Text: Wonderful flavors and friendly service. Definitely a family favorite for dine-in or take-out. The Chicken Tikka Masala and Karahi Lamb are exceptional. Five-Stars!

Name: Mayur
Review Text: Yesterday was our first time we came to that place. But It is absolutely not the last. We had a good time with the courteous service, with the superb cooking and fine drinks and with the modest pay. We will no doubt return there again.

Name: Mayur
Review Text: Service at the beginning of the meal was overly attentive, and by the end of the meal, it had fallen apart! The food was fine, but the price was on the hefty side. The decor was pleasant, and the beer is served in a frosty glass; however, I probably won't return.
